overview:
Louis Herrera is the CEO/Managing Broker of RT Brokerage Services, Inc.

Louis brings fifteen years of venture-backed, high-technology startup experience and regional government growth management experience to RT Brokerage Services. Prior to RT Brokerage Services, he was the director of operations at m:metrics (acquired by ComScore), Nimble Technology (acquired by Actuate), and at Appliant, Inc. (acquired by Tonic Software). Before his startup experiences, Louis was a growth management planner at the Puget Sound Regional Council (PSRC).

Mr. Herrera serves on the Executive Board of the Northwest Independent Broker’s Association (IBA) as the Treasurer, and on the Advisory Board of Coyote Central , an after-school arts program for middle-school kids in the Central Area. He is also active in neighborhood planning efforts.

Louis holds BA in urban studies and planning from the University of California, San Diego (Warren College). He has also completed two years of graduate work at the University of Washington (College of the Built Environment) studying urban design and planning, and real estate finance. Before entering graduate school, Louis served two years as a Peace Corps Voluneer in Nepal (N165B) where he was an urban planner for the Bharatpur Nagar Panchayat.
